t: Applied Science | Amazon.jobs
s: Applied Scientists are specialists with deep expertise in at least one scientific discipline that applies to Amazon’s business challenges. They also have a broad knowledge in data structures and algorithms and understand algorithmic and implementation tradeoffs.
